    paintBackground(Graphics2D) - Method in class game.core.GameView
    Paints the game background depending on the current level.
    paintComponent(Graphics) - Method in class game.ui.PauseOverlayPanel
    Overrides JComponent.paintComponent(Graphics) to draw a semi-transparent black background over the entire panel, enhancing the overlay effect.
    paintComponent(Graphics) - Method in class game.util.PolygonEditor
    Draw the image (if any) and polygon.
    paintForeground(Graphics2D) - Method in class game.core.GameView
    Paints foreground UI elements such as the score and health bar, and adds a live timer HUD.
    pauseGame() - Method in class game.core.Game
    Pauses the game by stopping the main loop, pausing physics, and halting background music.
    PauseOverlayPanel - Class in game.ui
    A semi-transparent overlay panel used for pausing the game.
    PauseOverlayPanel(Game) - Constructor for class game.ui.PauseOverlayPanel
    Constructs a PauseOverlayPanel with semi-transparent background and various sound control components and buttons.
    pauseStart - Variable in class game.core.Game
    The timestamp (in milliseconds) of when the current pause began.
    pauseWorld() - Method in class game.core.GameWorld
    Pauses the world by stopping the physics simulation and freezing enemies/obstacles.
    pixelScale - Variable in class game.util.PolygonEditor
    screen pixels per bitmap pixel
    Platform - Class in game.entities
    Represents a static platform in the game world that players can stand or jump on.
    Platform(World, Vec2, String) - Constructor for class game.entities.Platform
    Constructs a new Platform in the given game world at the specified position and applies a texture to visually represent it.
    PLATFORM_SHAPE - Static variable in class game.entities.Platform
    Defines the fixed shape of the platform: wide and flat.
    platformTexture - Variable in class game.levels.Level

    PLAYER_SHAPE - Static variable in class game.entities.Player

    playGameOverSound() - Method in class game.audio.SoundManager
